TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Recreational Drums
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows drums to be used for recreation, like other instruments.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Repair In zone
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, forces pawns to remain inside allowed zones when repairing. This is honestly more of a bug fix than a tweak, Ludeon c'mon.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prisoner Cleaning
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows prisoners to perform cleaning tasks.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prisoner Recreation
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows prisoners to perform recreation tasks.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Job Authors
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, removes authors from crafted items so anyone can finish them. Quality is based on the pawn that finishes the job.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prioritize Research
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows pawns to prioritize research.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prioritize Recreation
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows pawns to prioritize recreation.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prioritize Sleep
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows pawns to prioritize sleep, as long as they are below 75% rest.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Repair After Constructing
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Pawns will repair after constructing with this enabled.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Smooth Walls Before Floors
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Pawns will smooth walls before floors with this enabled.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Deconstruct First
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Pawns will deconstruct before constructing with this enabled.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Backstory Incapabilities
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes all work incapabilities from backstories, both adulthood and childhood, including modded. Humanoid Alien Races backstories might not be affected as they use a separate def.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Haul After Slaughter
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Similar to Skilled Stone Cutting, adds a skill that can be used to speed up chopping down trees specifically. Patches for a bunch of mods are already included so axes and the like will have an actual effect.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skilled Tree Chopping
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Similar to Skilled Stone Cutting, adds a skill that can be used to speed up chopping down trees specifically. Patches for a bunch of mods are already included so axes and the like will have an actual effect.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skilled Stonecutting
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Makes stonecutting give crafting skill increases, and makes more skilled crafters create blocks quicker.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Faster Cleaning
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Changes the speed at which cleaning is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the speed at which stone Cleaning is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Speed Factor
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the speed at which stone Cleaning is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Faster Smoothing
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Changes the speed at which stone smoothing is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the speed at which stone smoothing is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Speed Factor
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the speed at which stone smoothing is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows the skill tweaks to function.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Loss Multiplier
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Multiplier on rate of skill loss.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Gain Multiplier
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Multiplier on rate of skill gain.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Loss Threshold
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The level a skill has to reach before skill loss starts happening, it will prevent skill loss entirely below that level.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Learning Per Day
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: After a set amount of xp has been learnt for this skill since the last midnight passes, the amount that that can be learnt is lowered. This lets you change how much xp a pawn can gain in any given skill before that kicks in.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Hunters Can Use Melee
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Allows hunters to use melee, regardless of how well they can do so.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows hunters to use melee, regardless of how well they can do so.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Allow Fists
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows hunters to use their fists to hunt, stupid but it works.
